ovdesc.p: Summary: Allows all User Profiles to be listed which are currently unusable and shows the reason why this is so.
To Use: ACTION LINE Enter: PASSWORD.EXCEPTION when AWAITING APPLICATION is displayed.
Details: The reasons for User Profiles being unusable are shown in columns and are as defined below:
REC-ST i) INAU - The record is unauthorised ii) IHLD - The record is in Hold.
ATTEMPTS x(yALL) - Since the last successful Sign On an incorrect Password has been entered more times (x) than the maximum number allowed (y) in the ATTEMPTS Field (13) of the User Record.
START/END i) START The current date is earlier DATE than the START DATE PROFILE in the USER Record.
